name: 8 vs 8 Pool: 8 Ball Pool Game
description:
One of the Most addictive puzzle game on AppStore!

Play 8 vs 8 pool game against Computer!!

8 vs 8 Pool is a twisted Pool games which will improve you skills to calculate angles and speed in billiards game.

Game Features
- Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-look
- Unique ,Easy and smooth gameplay
